name: TopPick Sourcing Extension
description: This extension helps you import candidates into the TopPick CRM.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 https://engagement-qa.toppick.co https://api-dev.toppick.co http://localhost:3001; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com;
